attributes.description: Properties that describe how this animation works.

single.description: If enabled, the animation will stop after one iteration.

sticky.description: If enabled, the animation will not return to the default frame when stopped.

class.description: The internal class represented by this file.

default.description: The frame index this animation defaults to.

steps.description: The number of rendering steps each frame should be visible before advancing.

textures.description: An array of textures to use as frames in the animation.

items.description: A path or URL linking to a texture file.
